pages.text: The Fargo's Dungeon is the only place to get Abominable Energy, one of the critical crafting components for Talisman Bases.  They can be looted from chests in this dungeon.
A small glimpse at what the dungeon looks like.

pages.title: Looted Items
pages.text: Chests have a chance to contain a crafting item used in the Soul of Colossus.
The soul is crafted using items found within chests in the Fargo's Dungeon.

pages.title: Scavenged Items
pages.text: Zombies, Skeletons, Creepers, and Spiders all have a 5% chance to drop an item that is used in the Soul of Supersonic.  Looting adds 2% for every level.  The drops are RNG so you may get repeats.
The soul is crafted using items dropped from mobs inside the Fargo's Dungeon.
